thread.title: Nicki Minaj Gets Props From Kendrick Lamar And Twitter's Upset
thread.title_full: Nicki Minaj Gets Props From Kendrick Lamar And Twitter's Upset

author: Shaun M
title: Nicki Minaj Gets Props From Kendrick Lamar And Twitter's Upset
text:
Home > Music > Nicki Minaj Gets Props From Kendrick Lamar And Twitter's Upset Nicki Minaj Gets Props From Kendrick Lamar And Twitter's Upset 0 0 Posted by Shaun M , Feb 24, 2017 at 05:11pm Kendrick Lamar made his fans salty when he sent a congratulatory tweet to Nicki Minaj. 
Nicki Minaj 's collaboration with Gucci Mane was met with a favorable response Friday. Their new track "Make Love" is making waves across social media. However, the proverbial shit hit the fan when Kendrick Lamar sent her a tweet saying, "I love it Nicki Minaj." I love it Nicki Minaj. ğŸ˜ğŸ‘‘ğŸ¤• â€” Kendrick Lamar (@kendricklamar) February 24, 2017 
Nicki sent a thank you tweet to the To Pimp A Butterfly emcee. ğŸ˜¬I knew you would ğŸ˜œ ha! Thx Kendrick ğŸ™ğŸ½ https://t.co/7xROfehOeE â€” NICKI MINAJ (@NICKIMINAJ) February 24, 2017 
Kendrick's Twitter followers though chose to be salty, throwing shade on the TDE rapper. Still, Nicki got the worst of it. While some fans defended her, Twitter sent a true barrage of hate toward the New York City diva of rap. 
Rumor has it that Minaj's verse included shots directed at Remy Ma . The two have held a long-simmering rivalry and, with Minaj hinting at an upcoming project, things might come to a head this year. 
Here are some of the most upset rap fans' tweets of the day. â€” FUTURE HNDRXXX â˜”ï¸ (@NickFalconPunch) February 24, 2017 @kendricklamar So you got time to tweet Nicki Minaj hearts but don't have time to finish the Black Hippy album/collab album with J. Cole? pic.twitter.com/VK87rjqwMA 
And here tweets from Nicki Minaj fans. @kendricklamar It's just niggas commenting under this post too. Y'all hate when niggas give females props. pic.twitter.com/ZNxkfw7hKn â€” â­ï¸Hustle & Glowâ­ï¸ (@Nerdiction) February 24, 2017 @kendricklamar his fans are mad lmao imagine hating a successful artist only because she is a female running a male dominated genre lol pic.twitter.com/hOu6KOL2ky < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Feb 24, 2017 at 05:11pm 0 Views 
Today has been by far 2017's best day of releases. Kendrick Lamar made his fans salty when he sent a congratulatory tweet to Nicki Minaj. 
Nicki Minaj 's collaboration with Gucci Mane was met with a favorable response Friday. Their new track "Make Love" is making waves across social media. However, the proverbial shit hit the fan when Kendrick Lamar sent her a tweet saying, "I love it Nicki Minaj." Kendrick's Twitter followers though chose to be salty, throwing shade on the TDE rapper. Still, Nicki got the worst of it. While some fans defended her, Twitter sent a true barrage of hate toward the New York City diva of rap. 
Rumor has it that Minaj's verse included shots directed at Remy Ma . The two have held a long-simmering rivalry and, with Minaj hinting at an upcoming project, things might come to a head this year.
